column5: Planning on hitting the ice for a couple days .. Wend/Thurs .. if you had a couple days to fish where would ya go .. I know where to go on Simcoe so if you pick Quinte let me know where so I can get into some nice sized eyes (only fished there in the fall)
id do quinte since i live close by to simcoe... id stick to big bay as other areas are NEVER really SAFE....

What do you mean the other areas are never really safe? If the ice conditions are supposed to be good should it be alright? Im asking cause i plan on heading over to one of those other areas, sorta in the narrows actually, this weekend for my first time.
I am heading to Quinte this weekend and will be fishing off Huffs Road.  Look for flats adjacent to deeper water.
Good luck Grateful fisher .. I never did make it out on Wend .. didnt feel like sitting in traffic to get thru Toronto because of that bit of snow we got
